postTranslate.title: Bitcoin price ‘very near bottom’ with $30K dip, says bullish institutional report
postTranslate.leadText: Stack Funds draws attention to this week’s $2.3-billion Bitcoin options expiry, with a potential change in sentiment coming thereafter.

postTranslate.title: Bitcoin heading for worst quarter since start of 2018 bear market
postTranslate.leadText: Bitcoin appears poised to post its second-weakest quarter since the start of 2014.

postTranslate.title: US miner raises $105M to recycle waste coal into crypto
postTranslate.leadText: Stronghold Digital Mining has raised more than $100 million in two private placements supporting its model for sustainable Bitcoin mining.

postTranslate.title: Bitcoin price bounces to $33K but analysts say ‘it’s too early’ to call a bottom
postTranslate.leadText: Dip buyers stepped in as Bitcoin price fell to $29,000 but analysts caution that China’s crackdown on BTC mining and a lack of buy volume mean the crypto market has not found a bottom yet.

postTranslate.title: Bad call? Bitfinex bears closed a block of Bitcoin shorts before the drop below $32K
postTranslate.leadText: Bitcoin short positions at Bitfinex soared as BTC price dropped below $40,000, so why did the majority of them close before the largest part of the correction?

postTranslate.title: Bitcoin price clings to $32K as on-chain metrics hint at further downside
postTranslate.leadText: China’s continued crackdown on Bitcoin mining and OTC transactions, along with prolonged technical weakness, triggered BTC’s drop to a 6-month low.

postTranslate.title: Norwegian FSA sees urgent need for crypto investor protection
postTranslate.leadText: Norway’s Financial Supervisory Authority says it only supervises crypto companies for money laundering.

postTranslate.title: Powers On... El Salvador is the unlikely leader for sovereign adoption of Bitcoin as national currency
postTranslate.leadText: The question is not whether Bitcoin will be the future of money; the question is how, where and when it will be the future of money.

postTranslate.title: A ‘seismic mining shift’ may be driving Bitcoin price below $30K: Report
postTranslate.leadText: The benchmark cryptocurrency slipped briefly under the $29,500-level on June 22 as a Glassnode report indicated the possibility of miner capitulation in China.

postTranslate.title: Bitcoin drops below $30K to 6-month lows: Watch these next price support levels
postTranslate.leadText: Downward selling pressure sees Bitcoin swiftly take out $30,000 support as Binance users report technical difficulties.

postTranslate.title: UN sees blockchain technology as tool to fight climate crisis
postTranslate.leadText: The U.N. will keep exploring the uses of blockchain technology to improve the reliability of data on harmful greenhouse gas emissions.

postTranslate.title: Denied electricity, world’s 5th-largest mining pool leaves China for Kazakhstan
postTranslate.leadText: Crypto mining pool BTC.com is leaving China after local authorities withdrew its power supply.

postTranslate.title: China’s crackdown means Bitcoin is working, says crypto miner
postTranslate.leadText: A former crypto exchange engineer believes that China’s ban on Bitcoin mining is “fantastic news.”

postTranslate.title: VanEck files for a new Bitcoin futures mutual fund with US SEC
postTranslate.leadText: VanEck’s new “Bitcoin Strategy Fund” will invest in BTC futures, pooled investment vehicles and exchange-traded products providing exposure to Bitcoin.

postTranslate.title: Bitcoin bear market confirmed? Analysts at odds over whales’ BTC exchange moves
postTranslate.leadText: Whale selling pressure is too great to preserve the bull market for now, one warning says, while similarities to 2017 provide a silver lining for hodlers.

postTranslate.title: Bitcoin hashrate hits 8-month low as Chinese miners power down
postTranslate.leadText: Bitcoin’s hashrate plummets to roughly 91 EH/s as Sichuan miners close up shop.

postTranslate.title: Bitcoin is ‘own worst enemy' and will lose to Ethereum: Charles Hoskinson
postTranslate.leadText: Bitcoin is too slow when compared to Ethereum and other proof-of-stake networks, argued Cardano founder, Charles Hoskinson.

postTranslate.title: 4 reasons why Paul Tudor Jones' 5% Bitcoin exposure advice is difficult for major funds
postTranslate.leadText: Major funds are probably interested in Bitcoin and altcoins, but four significant hurdles are preventing them from investing.

postTranslate.title: Top 5 cryptocurrencies to watch this week: BTC, ADA, THETA, XMR, AMP
postTranslate.leadText: If Bitcoin price remains in the current range, ADA, THETA, XMR and AMP could bounce higher over the coming days.

postTranslate.title: Bitcoin price can hit $450K in 2021, $135K is 'worst-case scenario' — PlanB
postTranslate.leadText: The only way is (more or less) up for BTC price action, the analyst insists, offering a potential 2021 high of $450,000.

postTranslate.title: Bitcoin price dips below $34K as day of Grayscale's giant BTC unlocking draws near
postTranslate.leadText: Downward volatility hits the market on Sunday, as market participants argue that most of the drop is already complete.

postTranslate.title: NFT art galleries: Future of digital artwork or another crypto fad?
postTranslate.leadText: Physical NFT art galleries are popping up all over, but why? And does the public appreciate them, regardless of their crypto knowledge?

postTranslate.title: 3 reasons why Ethereum may underperform Bitcoin in the short-term
postTranslate.leadText: Ether could take longer than 12 months to regain ground versus Bitcoin due to increased uncertainties surrounding the shift to ETH 2.0 and reservations from institutional investors.

postTranslate.title: Data suggests the strong US dollar makes Bitcoin weaker argument is flawed
postTranslate.leadText: Analysts and traders are linking Bitcoin's bearish turn with the growing strength of the U.S. dollar, but data suggests otherwise.

postTranslate.title: Bitcoin may lose $30K price level if stocks tank, analysts warn
postTranslate.leadText: Downside risks for BTC price are also heightened due to the recent dollar bounce.

postTranslate.title: Hawkish Fed comments push Bitcoin price and stocks lower again
postTranslate.leadText: Bitcoin price drops a leg lower and stocks slump after St. Lous Federal Reserve President James Bullard signals that interest rates could rise by the end of this year.

postTranslate.title: Bulls hesitate to buy the dip after Bitcoin price falls close to $35K
postTranslate.leadText: Bitcoin’s drop to $35,130 has bulls hesitant to buy the current dip but on-chain data shows long-term holders continue to accumulate.

postTranslate.title: Crypto company CEO says the recent crypto boom brought increased adoption
postTranslate.leadText: Crypto usage in 2021 differs from the 2017 rally, according to the CEO of StormX.

postTranslate.title: Price analysis 6/18: BTC, ETH, BNB, ADA, DOGE, XRP, DOT, UNI, LTC, BCH
postTranslate.leadText: Traders expect further downside from Bitcoin and altcoins after BTC dropped below a key support level at $36,000.

postTranslate.title: Goldman Sachs to offer Bitcoin futures trading in partnership with Galaxy Digital
postTranslate.leadText: Mike Novogratz’s Galaxy Digital will serve as the counterparty entity for Goldman Sachs’s Bitcoin futures trading product.
